basics.name: Dr. Troy E. Sybert
basics.label: Innovator for Christ
basics.summary: With a passion to share the message of repentance, Dr. Sybert believes true repentance is the only way to God through Christ. Before starting the Voice of Repentance Ministries, he worked as a physician leader for over two decades. While his prior work focused on the physical body, he realizes the work of healing the inner person is more important. Repentance is a journey, not a destination.
